I love you so much, and I'm so grateful to be your wife. You make my life so pleasant, and I feel so great when we're together. Our relationship is truly wonderful, and I can't imagine my life without you. I know that some people may hate the idea of being in a relationship, but for me, it's the best thing that has ever happened.
